home_description: The little space in the web of Juan Pablo Jiménez, where he showcases his works, experiments, and projects related to web development. A space where you can get to know better who is Juan Pablo Jiménez, frontend and creative developer. From Medellín to the world!
first_section_text_1: Hello there! welcome to my little space in the web, here I showcase my works, experiments and projects related to web development. Right now am experiencing with animations and transitions effects to create a more profound experience.
first_section_text_2: I am a frontend engineer based in Medellín, Colombia, driven by a constant passion for creation and improvement. I am enthusiastic about technology and always eager to embrace new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
second_section_text_1: I have been working as a UI Web Developer at Globant for the past year, contributing to a project where we implemented microfrontends using React and Webpack.
second_section_text_2: Additionally, I have been involved in the development of a certificate management platform for a client using NextJS and TypeScript.

cookies.message: This site uses cookies to analyze web traffic. Do you accept the use of cookies?
